summary: A young girl becomes friends with a wolf and its little puppy. She decides to save them from three local shepherds.
cast: Julia Pauline Boracco Braathen|Jørgen Langhelle|Line Verndal|Samuel Fröler|Niklas James Knudsen|Ingar Helge Gimle|Aksel Hennie|Robert Skjærstad|Frank Robert Andreassen|John Ivar Bye|Harald Dal|Åsne Seierstad|Arild Svensgam
title: Verano de lobos
